short_summary: The Canadian Grain Commissions (CGC) has a requirement for the supply, delivery, installation and training of two (2) pulse nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) instruments. .
description: The new instruments must allow the simultaneous determination of oil content and moisture content of oilseeds samples according to ISO 10565:1998. The system will be used to measure the oil content of oilseeds and oilseeds meals as routine analysis using a minimum of 25 g of oilseeds but it must also allow the analysis of small sample size, e.g. less than 10 g, for research samples.
full_summary:

## Tender Description
AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: All bid submissions must be received by May 10, 2023, at 2:00 P.M. EDT. All bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

The Canadian Grain Commission (CGC) is seeking to purchase and install two (2) pulse nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) instruments. The instruments must be able to determine the oil content and moisture content of
